fact.description: The match is underway at Mineirao Stadium.
Free kick Chile.
Chile to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Chile.
Chile awarded a free kick in their own half.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Chile in their own half.
The match at Mineirao Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Charles Aranguiz, who is down injured.
Chile’s Charles Aranguiz is on his feet again at Mineirao Stadium.
Play is underway once more.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Free kick for Brazil in the half of Chile.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Howard Webb.
Brazil's Marcelo misses with an attempt on goal.
Howard Webb awards Chile a goal kick.
Chile are pushing forward but Marcelo Diaz's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Attention is being given to Brazil’s Neymar and play has been suspended briefly.
Play has been resumed.
Can Chile get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Neymar for Brazil is back on the field again.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Chile in the half of Brazil.
Free kick for Chile in their own half.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Chile in their own half.
Throw-in Brazil.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Chile awarded a free kick in their own half.
Neymar gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brazil.
Chile needs to be cautious. Brazil have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Brazil close to the penalty box.
Brazil are in shooting range from this free kick.
Eugenio Mena is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
In Belo Horizonte Brazil drive forward through Hulk. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Thiago Silva with an assist there.
Throw-in for Brazil at Mineirao Stadium.
Free kick Brazil.
Free kick for Chile in their own half.
Chile have a dangerous throw-in.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Howard Webb signals a Chile throw-in in Brazil's half.
Chile awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Chile is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chile awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Brazil's Neymar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Chile at Mineirao Stadium.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Brazil.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Neymar for Brazil who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Neymar has recovered and rejoins the match in Belo Horizonte.
Howard Webb has blown to resume play in Belo Horizonte.
Free kick for Chile in their own half.
Free kick for Chile in their own half.
Can Chile get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Howard Webb awards the home team a throw-in.
That's a fine assist from Eduardo Vargas.
Ball goes out of play for a Chile goal kick.
Howard Webb signals a throw-in for Chile, close to Brazil's area.
Brazil have a goal kick.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Howard Webb signals a Brazil throw-in in Chile's half.
Can Brazil capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chile's half?
Brazil drive upfield and Neymar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Chile defender.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Throw-in for Brazil at Mineirao Stadium.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Howard Webb.
Brazil push forward at Mineirao Stadium and Fred gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Chile defence.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Chile in their own half.
Free kick for Brazil in their own half.
Fred of Brazil gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Chile goal kick.
Free kick for Brazil in the half of Chile.
Francisco Silva (Chile) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Howard Webb awards Chile a goal kick.
Throw-in for Chile in the half of Brazil.
Chile's Arturo Vidal is on target but unsuccessful.
Dani Alves for Brazil drives towards goal at Mineirao Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Brazil in Belo Horizonte.
Can Brazil capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chile's half?
Throw-in Chile.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Howard Webb.
Fred (Brazil) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Belo Horizonte Brazil attack through Hulk. The finish is off target, however.
Chile have a goal kick.
Chile awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Brazil's Fred breaks free at Mineirao Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Chile's Alexis Sanchez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Brazil defender.
Corner awarded to Chile.
2 minutes will be added to the first half.
Chile have been awarded a corner by Howard Webb.
Eugenio Mena for Chile gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Howard Webb blows to end the first-half.
Free kick Chile.
Brazil are coming forward and Fernandinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Chile at Mineirao Stadium.
Chile to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Howard Webb awards the away team a throw-in.
Howard Webb signals a Brazil throw-in in Chile's half.
At Mineirao Stadium, Hulk has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Jorge Luis Sampaoli is making the team's first substitution at Mineirao Stadium with Felipe Gutierrez replacing Eduardo Vargas.
Chile have been awarded a corner by Howard Webb.
Throw-in Chile.
Free kick for Chile in the half of Brazil.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chile's half?
Chile awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luiz Gustavo (Brazil) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Chile to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Chile.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Throw-in for Chile in the half of Brazil.
Throw-in for Chile in the half of Brazil.
The home team replace Fred with Jo.
Charles Aranguiz of Chile smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Chile.
Throw-in for Brazil at Mineirao Stadium.
Howard Webb awards the away team a throw-in.
Chile awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chile's half?
Neymar for the home team is judged to be offside.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Chile in their own half.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Chile.
Brazil have a goal kick.
Brazil make their second substitution with Ramires replacing Fernandinho.
Howard Webb awards the home team a throw-in.
Brazil's Jo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Chile goal kick.
Hulk of Brazil gets in a strike, but is off target.
Howard Webb awards Chile a goal kick.
Ball safe as Chile is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Brazil in their own half.
Free kick for Brazil in their own half.
Chile awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte, Neymar (Brazil) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Chile in their own half.
Brazil's Hulk gets in a shot on goal at Mineirao Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Brazil push forward through Jo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Chile territory.
Mauricio Pinilla is replacing Arturo Vidal for the away team.
Goal kick for Chile at Mineirao Stadium.
Howard Webb signals a throw-in for Chile, close to Brazil's area.
Throw-in for Chile at Mineirao Stadium.
3 minutes will be added to the second half in Belo Horizonte.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Belo Horizonte Chile's Mauricio Isla is caught offside.
It's 1-1 at the end of normal time.
Throw-in Brazil.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Brazil close to the penalty box.
Howard Webb signals a Chile throw-in in Brazil's half.
Chile have been awarded a corner by Howard Webb.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The first extra period has started.
Important block from the Chile defence as Neymar fires in a strike for Brazil.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Chile awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Chile in the half of Brazil.
Jo (Brazil) has received a yellow card from Howard Webb.
Chile are coming forward and Marcelo Diaz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Free kick for Chile in their own half.
Chile have a dangerous throw-in.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Throw-in for Brazil in the half of Chile.
Howard Webb awards the away team a throw-in.
Brazil awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Chile territory.
Brazil drive forward and Jo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Brazil.
Brazil push forward at Mineirao Stadium and Oscar gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Chile defence.
Howard Webb signals a Chile throw-in in Brazil's half.
Chile's Mauricio Pinilla has been booked in Belo Horizonte.
Hulk of Brazil smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick Chile.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
Neymar for Brazil is whistled offside.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dani Alves (Brazil) has received a first yellow card.
Chile's Alexis Sanchez misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
It's 1-1 at the end of the first period.
Willian is replacing Oscar for Brazil at Mineirao Stadium.
The second extra period has started.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Howard Webb.
Brazil's Jo breaks free at Mineirao Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Chile goal kick.
Gary Medel is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The match in Belo Horizonte is underway once more.
Gary Medel, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Jose Rojas is the substitute for Chile.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Chile at Mineirao Stadium.
Free kick for Chile in their own half.
Free kick Brazil.
Mauricio Pinilla for Chile gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Brazil have a goal kick.
Brazil are pushing forward but Dani Alves's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Chile at Mineirao Stadium.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Chile are pushing forward but Marcelo Diaz's finish is wide of the goal.
Howard Webb awards Brazil a goal kick.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Brazil.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chile's half?
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Chile in their own half.
Free kick for Brazil in the half of Chile.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Brazil's Hulk misses with an attempt on goal.
Howard Webb awards Chile a goal kick.
Brazil needs to be cautious. Chile have an attacking throw-in.
Chile drive into the zone and Mauricio Pinilla is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Corner awarded to Brazil.
The first half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Brazil are coming forward and Ramires gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Chile at Mineirao Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Brazil goal kick.
It's 1-1 at the end of extra-time.
The match goes to penalties!
The penalty shootout is over. The final score is 4-3.
